header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Future plans, Relationships, Trip to Edinburgh/London, Flooding in the Lakes, Christmas, Present buying, Family.
header.activity: Talking whilst on the way to Edinburgh.
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, complaining, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements, apologising

body.u: so I'm glad we're finally on the train after a twenty minute delay

I know well the tracks at are really bad at the moment so we'll probably be delayed on the way back as well I think the flooding's eroded part of the track so when I was going to it was delayed by half an hour
yeah I can't believe like how much the flooding's like affected us like I had no idea how bad it was
I know
erm
well I've never ever seen it flooded in before
yeah I know
it's so sad and when you drive through there's so many like houses that have all been flooded

and like all the sofas and
businesses
everything in just in the middle of the streets it's so bad
yeah like my friend's er dad owns a business and all of his work that er was due to be shipped out has been ruined so obviously that's not good is it?
oh god and so close to Christmas as well
I know
there was this family that posted on Facebook looking for a erm house to rent
yeah
because their son's in hospital with cancer and he can come home now for Christmas but they don't have anywhere to live so it's awful
yeah I think the only positive thing to come out of it is the deadline's been moved back
I know well I didn't I didn't have to do my stats exam
because they've postponed it all which I think the stats teacher's quite annoyed at but
